name: Paris
description: Experience the romantic ambiance of Paris, the City of Love. Visit iconic landmarks like the Eiffel Tower and Louvre Museum. Enjoy exquisite French cuisine and stroll along the Seine River.
activities: Explore art galleries and boutiques in Le Marais
Indulge in a wine and cheese tasting

name: Kyoto
description: Immerse yourself in the traditional beauty of Kyoto. Explore ancient temples, peaceful gardens, and traditional tea houses. Witness the breathtaking cherry blossoms in spring.

name: Rio de Janeiro
description: Discover the vibrant city of Rio de Janeiro with its stunning beaches, vibrant culture, and iconic landmarks. Relax on Copacabana Beach, hike up to Christ the Redeemer, and experience the excitement of Carnival.
best_time_to_visit: September to November and March to May
activities: Attend a soccer match at Maracanã Stadium
